Undulating Pseudopod.name: Undulating Pseudopod
Undulating Pseudopod.fullText:
Formless Predator Attack 11Undulating Pseudopod

As you flow across the battlefield, a pseudopod briefly forms on your body, reaching out to confound an enemy.

Encounter        Implement, Primal, Psionic
Standard Action      Melee touch

Target: One creature

Effect: You shift your speed. You may make the following attack at any point during this movement.

Attack: Wisdom vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d8 + Dexterity or Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 394.
Undulating Pseudopod.flavor: As you flow across the battlefield, a pseudopod briefly forms on your body, reaching out to confound an enemy.

Touch of Dissolution.name: Touch of Dissolution
Touch of Dissolution.fullText:
Formless Predator Attack 20Touch of Dissolution

With a single touch, your foe’s body dissolves into a protoplasmic form.

Daily        Beast Form, Implement, Polymorph, Primal, Psionic
Standard Action      Melee touch

Target: One creature

Attack: Wisdom vs. Fortitude

Hit: 4d10 + Dexterity or Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is blinded and takes ongoing 15 damage (save ends both).

  Each Failed Saving Throw: The ongoing damage increases by 5.

Miss: Half damage, and the target is blinded and takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends both).


Published in Dragon Magazine 394.
Touch of Dissolution.flavor: With a single touch, your foe’s body dissolves into a protoplasmic form.

Miss: Half damage, and the target is blinded and takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends both).

Amorphous Return.name: Amorphous Return
Amorphous Return.fullText:
Formless Predator Utility 12Amorphous Return

Nothing can force you into a specific form for long.

Encounter        Primal, Psionic
No Action      Personal

Trigger: You start your turn and are affected by a polymorph effect or an effect that is petrifying you.

Effect: You end the effect, and you gain 10 temporary hit points.


Published in Dragon Magazine 394.
Amorphous Return.flavor: Nothing can force you into a specific form for long.

Effect: You end the effect, and you gain 10 temporary hit points.
